title: Junior Frontend Developer
description: We're looking for a passionate junior frontend developer to join our growing team. You'll work on modern web applications using React, TypeScript, and CSS. This is a great opportunity to learn from experienced developers and contribute to real-world projects. We offer mentorship, flexible hours, and a supportive environment for junior developers.

title: Junior Data Analyst
description: Join our data team as a junior analyst! You'll work with SQL, Python, and visualization tools to help businesses make data-driven decisions. Perfect role for someone who loves numbers and wants to grow in the data field. We provide training and mentorship to help you succeed.
